Support

In order to support homeless animals and recieve a gratitude from us, complete the following steps:

  1. Choose a souvenir you want to recieve.
  2. Tranfer money to the organization (see below for more information).

    40 PLN for t-shirt or 25 PLN for mug.

    Title your transfer “DAROWIZNA” and add the code of a chosen souvenir.

  3. Pick up your souvenir at the conference registration point.

Souvenirs

Code: Mug1

Code: Mug2

Code: Mug3

Code: SHIRTmenS (or M, L, XL, XXL)

Code: SHIRTwomS (or M, L, XL, XXL)

Available at Adform stand during the conference

Organizations

All the groups we support are the part of Viva!, a non­governmental international organization dedicated to protect animals, raising funds for their actions on their own.

Dom Tymczasowy Kocia Łapka

"Kocia Łapka" is a temporary house for homeless and wild cats from Pruszkow and suburbs of Warsaw. It is run by a small group of volunteers, whose mission is to save and heal homeless cats, and to find new homes for them. They also sterilize wild cats, take care of abandoned ones, sick or too young to survive by themselves.

Domestic transfers:

Fundacja Międzynarodowy Ruch na Rzecz Zwierząt Viva!

ul. Kawęczyńska 16/39, 03­772 Warszawa

PL02 2030 0045 1110 0000 0255 7280

International transfers:

PayPal: dtkocialapka@gmail.com

Zwierzaki z Mińska

A group of volunteers from Minsk Mazowiecki, whose actions are focused on the area of the town. They are finding and sterilizing homeless dogs and cats, feeding them and keeping in temporary homes, to finally find them new ones where they can live happy and safe life with new owners.

Domestic transfers:

Fundacja Międzynarodowy Ruch na Rzecz Zwierząt ­ Viva!

ul. Kawęczyńska 16/39, 03­772 Warszawa

PL63 2030 0045 1110 0000 0260 1190

International transfers:

SWIFT: GOPZPLPW

IBAN: PL 63 2030 0045 1110 0000 0260 1190

or

PayPal: zwierzakizminska@gmail.com

Grupa Pomocy Kotom MRAU

MRAU is a group of volunteers bringing help to cats from the Warsaw shelter in the Paluch area. They are taking care of homeless cats and also those staying in temporary homes, helping them to survive in the new reality. They are healing them, socializing and searching for new, best homes for the rest of they lives.

Domestic transfers:

Fundacja Międzynarodowy Ruch na Rzecz Zwierząt­Viva!

ul. Kawęczyńska 16/39, 03­772 Warszawa

PL93 2030 0045 1110 0000 0255 7970

Title of the transfer: “DAROWIZNA GPK Mrau”

International transfers:

SWIFT: GOPZPLPW

IBAN: PL93 2030 0045 1110 0000 0255 7970

Title of the transfer: “DAROWIZNA GPK Mrau”

Thank you!
